name: Check eligibility of customer to order a Card Reader - Customer is a cardReaderCustomer with a Active Card Reader

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

And I locate a customer using the following criteria:
| registrationNumber | type |
| 51190521 | Personal |

children.description: Locate by data: | registrationNumber | type | | 51190521 | Personal |

testSteps.description: And I have a valid customer token for customer "0100000934717507000"
And I authenticate the Customer "0100000934717507000" to authentication level 1 using a customer token

children.description: Update customer token with cust key: 0100000934717507000, KNOWN

testSteps.description: When I check the eligibility of customer "0100000934717507000" to order a Card Reader
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following Customer Card Reader information should be returned
| eligibleToOrder | pacStatus | customerCardReaderProfileLocked | hasNoActivatedCardAndNoEligibleDebitCardToUseWithCardReader | cardReaderCustomer | customerCardReaderProfileStatusActive | numberOfCardReadersOrdered |
| false | PAC Suspended | false | null | true | true | 0 |

children.description: Validate customer card reader info: | eligibleToOrder | pacStatus | customerCardReaderProfileLocked | hasNoActivatedCardAndNoEligibleDebitCardToUseWithCardReader | cardReaderCustomer | customerCardReaderProfileStatusActive | numberOfCardReadersOrdered | | false | PAC Suspended | false | null | true | true | 0 |

testSteps.description:
And the following Non Eligible Debit Card details should be returned
| cardNumber | cardStatusNormal | cardRelationshipCertain |

children.description: Validate debit cards: | cardNumber | cardStatusNormal | cardRelationshipCertain |

testSteps.description:
And the following available Card Reader Devices should be returned
| cardReaderDescription | cardReaderCost |
| STANDARD | 550 |
| USABILITY | 550 |

children.description: Validate available card reader devices: | cardReaderDescription | cardReaderCost | | STANDARD | 550 | | USABILITY | 550 |

title: Check eligibility of customer to order a Card Reader - Customer is a cardReaderCustomer with a Active Card Reader
description: Profile and an eligible card but not eligible to order because Pac Status not Active
